extension.summary: Next Up Episodes - Gets the next episodes to watch for TV shows in your library and sort by airdate/play date descending
extension.description: Produces a list of next up episodes to watch in descending order of air date/last played depending on the options the user chooses. For use with skin widgets (e.g. Skin Helper Service Widgets=>Video Addons=>Next Up Episodes) Changes V0.0.12: Added option in the settings "Update List Now" which will update the widget, also available as "plugin://plugin.video.nextup/update_widget" Added context items in the addon "Refresh Directory" (plugin://plugin.video.nextup/dir) + "Settings" (plugin://plugin.video.nextup/settings) so you could add a button to your home screen to change the next up method and then rerun the list "RunPlugin(plugin://plugin.video.nextup/settings)" or update it from within the addon
extension.disclaimer: Will only list next up episodes for shows in the library. DATABASE VERSION IS HARDCODED TO "MyVideos116.db" (KODI V18???) FUTURE VERSIONS MAY FIX THIS BUT FOR NOW OTHER VERSIONS OF KODI/VIDEOS DATABASE MAY NOT WORK!!
